"What's the latest stock price for Apple?"
"Show me the stock performance of Tesla in the last month."
"Analyze the trend for Amazon stocks."
"Find the highest performing stock in the last year."
"Can you show me the recent stock history for Microsoft?"
"Analyze the stock market performance of Alphabet."
"What's the current dividend yield for IBM stock?"
"Show me the 5-year stock chart for Facebook."
"Analyze the P/E ratio for Netflix stock."
"What's the stock market forecast for NVIDIA?"
